attributes.action: The BBC license fee should be declared as Conservative Party election expenses.
attributes.background: The BBC Trust is controlled by Conservative Party members and is biased towards them to the extent that they often just quote government statements as fact - fair enough, declare the BBC license fee as Conservative Party expenses.

rejection.details:
You can find out more about the rules on election spending here:

https://www.electoralcommission.org.uk/find-information-by-subject/political-parties-campaigning-and-donations/political-party-spending-at-elections
